_header: The holy ghost is to thee sent
_description: An Annunciation carol — six quatrains (aaab) and burden: ‘Hayl mary ful of grace / Moder in virginite’

BodArcSelB26.First Lines:
The holi goste is to the sentffrom the fader
                    omnipotent…
BodArcSelB26.Last Lines:
…Of þat we haue y done a mysPray for vs pur
                        charite

CamTCC1230.First Lines:
The holy gost is to þe sentffro þe fadyr
                    omnypotent…
CamTCC1230.Last Lines:
…Of þat we han don amysPrey for vs pur
                    charyte
